rdf:Description.dc:creator: Tommaso Agnoloni, Maria Teresa Sagri, Daniela Tiscornia
rdf:Description.dc:description: A subject thesaurus produced to support description and retrieval of crimes.
rdf:Description.dc:title: Thesaurus ASLT
